name: Hearten Oracle (for Ironsworn: Starforged by Shawn Tomkin)
name_original: Hearten Oracle (for Ironsworn: Starforged by Shawn Tomkin)
description:
This is an oracle by Julius Hennig (birb nerb) for the TTRPG 

Ironsworn: Starforged

by Shawn Tomkin.

It contains 50 prompts for interpersonal background information used for the Hearten Move and was created during the Starforged 2022 Jam on itch.io.

For more infos and a copy of the game, go visit https://www.ironswornrpg.com/product-ironsworn-starforged. 

(v0.1 // 08.05.2022)

Since this is a first draft, feedback is much appreciated here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1G5ly2gjxYFzr_ByUhNAC9Fd4xdVyGrT2ivyul4Dmsuo/...
